intro:
Bring cute baby dinosaurs to life with your own colors!
Create your very own dinosaur playground with the Crayon Series.
description:
[Meet 'Crayon Little Dino' – Your Child's First Dinosaur Friend!] The latest installment in the popular 'Crayon' series is finally here! This time, we’re traveling back to the mysterious age of dinosaurs. From T-Rex to Triceratops, the adorable baby dinosaurs kids love are waiting for your colorful touch.

Features:

Animated Dino Encyclopedia: Decorate over 16 different dinosaurs with your favorite colors. Once finished, they come to life with vivid reactions!

Diverse Artistic Tools: Use a wide range of crayon colors to let your child's imagination run wild.

Stress-Free Play: No rules, no time limits. Designed for kids to explore at their own pace and feel a sense of achievement.

Why It's Special: The intuitive UI, proven through the 'Crayon' series, allows even children who can't read yet to enjoy the game on their own. More than just a game, it’s the ultimate art content to develop color sense and concentration.
